links.*: The Book of Lost Tales Part One

wikitext.*:
'''''brithla''''' is a [[Gnomish]] noun for "pearl".<ref>{{PE|11}}, pp. 24, 67</ref> Its [[Qenya]] cognate was ''[[marilla]]''.<ref>{{LT1|Appendix}}, entry "Silmarilli"</ref>

==Examples==
* ''[[Silubrilt|Silu'''brilt''']]'' = "Moon Pearl"
* ''[[Tirimbrithla|Tirim'''brithla''']]'' = "Tower of Pearl"
